subject: PLS GET BACK TO ME VERY FAST
body:
PLS GET BACK TO ME VERY FAST Hello, 
I'm Okey Nwosu, a representative of First Inland Bank http://firstinlandbankplc.net), I have a sensitive and private brief message from the Senior Executives of this top Bank in need of your partnership to re-profile funds amounting to US$12.2M (Twelve Million Two Hundred Thousand United States Dollars). I will let you have the details, but in summary, the fund would be paid to you through a Finance Company where it is presently deposited as soon as the filing and documentation process is concluded in your name. This is a legitimate transaction without government interference and you shall be compensated with 20% of the total sum, should you and your companyagrees to work with us. If you are interested, please reply for further details.
Please Reply ONLY to: f.inlandbank@yahoo.com.hk Regards,Okey Nwosu Get news, entertainment and everything you care about at Live.com. Check it out!
